Details

PML 2016

Summary

  • Try to arrive by July 24th at the latest.
  • Try not to leave until July 30th at the earliest.
  • The party starts on July 25th at noon in Palamós.
  • 3-4 nights in Palamós and 3-4 nights in SCQ (this is still negotiable).
  • You need to arrange your own lodging outside of SCQ.

Dates

  • Main week: 25-29 July 2016

  • Extension week: 1-5 August 2015

Proposed timeline (for main week)

The below is a suggestion. Write to everyone if you prefer something else.

Weekday Date Daytime Sleep Details
Sat Jul 23 BCN / SCQ BCN / SCQ Arrival weekend. Chill in BCN/SCQ or make the journey to Palamós.
Sun Jul 24 BCN / SCQ / Palamós BCN / SCQ / Palamós Arrival weekend. Chill in BCN/SCQ or make the journey to Palamós.
Mon Jul 25 Palamós Palamós First official family meet-up. Lunch at 12:00 noon at (restaurant name).
Tue Jul 26 Palamós Palamós Beach, hang out, etc. in Palamós.
Wed Jul 27 Palamós / SCQ SCQ Morning beach. Afternoon journey to SCQ. Dinner in SCQ
Thu Jul 28 SCQ SCQ Village, wine tour, mountain bike, hike.
Fri Jul 29 SCQ SCQ Village, hang out, hike.
Sat Jul 30 SCQ / Barcelona SCQ / BCN Departure weekend. Chill in village or go to BCN.
Sun Jul 31 SCQ / Barcelona SCQ / BCN Departure weekend. Chill in village or go to BCN.

Timeline (for extension week)

To be determined (depending on who is staying longer, and what they want to do).

Arrival

Fly to Barcelona. Thereafter, where you guy depends both on when you arrive and where you want to stay. Write if you need help making these decisions. Otherwise, you're on your own.

Lodging

Barcelona (BCN)

Depending on when you arrive/depart, and your preference for / aversion to cities, you may want to spend a night or more in Barcelona. Lodging is ample in Barcelona, but can be pricey. You can avoid spending lots of money by:

  • Bypassing Barcelona entirely by staying in SCQ any day before the 25th or after the 28th.
  • Arranging with us (Joe/Coloma) to use our 2 bedroom apartment (already taken the night of the 24th, but otherwise available).
  • Arranging with us (Joe/Coloma) to use friends' apartments.

Alternatively, if you want to do your own thing, you can get a hotel or AirBnB in Barcelona.

Palamós

Palamós is about 1 hour 20 minutes from Barcelona. It was the Brew family reunion site even before PML.

For simplicity's sake, everyone should make their own reservations for Palamós for at least the nights of the 25th and the 26th (and perhaps before, for early arrivers). Hotels are an option, but it'll be cheaper and more enjoyable to group together families and get house/apartments through AirBnB. You're on your own for this.

Let's strive to all stay near each other. That means in the town of Palamós, as close as possible to the old sector (the bottom of the red area).

Santa Coloma de Queralt (SCQ)

SCQ is 1 hour from Barcelona / 2 hours from Palamós.

Given that this is a small town with no hotels and very few AirBnBs, we (Coloma/Joe) will arrange housing unless you prefer to do so yourself.

To-do list

  • Buy tickets
  • Send ticket details (flight numbers, arrival dates/times) to Joe (he'll compile a list for everyone)
  • If arriving on or before the 24th, decide on your pre-Palamós housing preferences. If you want to go to SCQ during that period, communicate this to Joe.
  • If you want to use the BCN apartment, or use one of our friends' apartments, communicate this to Joe.
  • Reserve housing for Palamós (hotel, AirBnB, etc.) on your own or in conjunction with other Brews.
  • Rent car.
